verbs.description: As [ARG0: a trumpet] [V: plays] [ARG1: Taps] [ARGM-LOC: at the Larned Cemetery] , dozens of residents gathered to remember a fallen hero . It was a graveside service late Monday , more than seventy years in the making .

[ARGM-TMP: As a trumpet plays Taps at the Larned Cemetery] , [ARG1: dozens of residents] [V: gathered] [ARGM-PRP: to remember a fallen hero] . It was a graveside service late Monday , more than seventy years in the making .
